intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite app on your phone?
Where do you enjoy spending time?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you like to do?

respond_situations.description: You see a shirt in a shop. You want to ask the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Would you like coffee or tea?

ask_situations.instruction: At school, the candidate asks a friend for help with homework.
You want to ask about a movie. You ask your friend. ..
At a shop, the candidate asks for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: You need to brush your teeth. Brush twice a day. Use a soft brush. Put on toothpaste. Rinse your mouth after brushing.

questions.question: What do you need to brush?

follow_up_questions.question: What is your favorite room in your home?
Who do you live with at home?
How do you feel in your home?
